tools.name: region_mapper
tools.description: Map and query geographic regions for satellite observations. Flexible tool that accepts region names OR coordinates. Returns bounding box [min_lon, min_lat, max_lon, max_lat] and center coordinates for satellite imagery queries.

region_name.description: Name of any geographic region worldwide (e.g., 'Taiwan Strait', 'New York', 'Mediterranean Sea', 'Munich')

coordinates.description: Direct coordinates as [lat, lon] to create bounding box around point (e.g., [48.1351, 11.5820] for Munich)

expand_bbox.description: Optional expansion factor for bounding box (e.g., 0.1 = 10% expansion, 0.5 = 50% expansion). Default is 0.5 for coordinate-based queries.

tools.parameter_requirements: CRITICAL: At least ONE of 'region_name' OR 'coordinates' MUST be provided. Extract location names from the task context.
examples: Get bounding box for any city or region name

tools.name: image_processor
tools.description: Process and analyze satellite imagery. Handles preprocessing, enhancement, and format conversion for optical and SAR imagery.

image_path.description: Path or identifier for the satellite image

tools.name: object_detector
tools.description: Detect and count objects in satellite imagery using computer vision. Supports detection of ships, vehicles, aircraft, buildings, and other objects.

image_data.description: Image data or path to image file

tools.name: data_fusion
tools.description: Fuse data from multiple sources and sensors (optical, SAR, AIS, etc.) to create comprehensive analysis. Combines and integrates multi-modal satellite data.

sources.description: Array of data sources to fuse
